bibl.title: From Logos to Myth. Egyptian Petitions of the 5th-7th Centuries. Avec résumé en tchèque.
bibl.note: It seems that the ways of thinking of the masses and the elite went two different ways. The elite tried to squeeze the world into the Procrustes bed of classical rhetoric. The people's masses have returned to the mythological way of thinking. Relies mainly on the archives of Dioscorus.
KOVEL'MAN A.B., From Logos to Myth. Egyptian Petitions of the 5th-7th Centuries. Avec résumé en tchèque.
